sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ADTApplicationController</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ADTApplicationController</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ADTApplicationController = Class.create();
ADTApplicationController.prototype = {
    initialize: function(appSrc, featureSysID) {
		ADTLogger.logAPIParams('initialize', [appSrc, featureSysID],this.type);
		ADTLogger.log('Launched the diagnsotic page on app_src: ' + appSrc + ' with feature_id: ' + featureSysID, this.type);
		this.appSrc = appSrc;
		this.featureSysID = featureSysID;
		this.applicationMetadata = null;
		this.errorMessage = "";
		this.askedForValidPage = this.isValid();
		
    },
	
	getErrorMessage: function() {
		return this.errorMessage;
	},
	
	areQueryParamsValid: function() {
		return this.askedForValidPage;
	},
	
	isValid: function() {
		if(gs.nil(this.appSrc)) {
			ADTLogger.log("Application src is nil", this.type);
			this.errorMessage = "Application not found";
			return false;
		}
		
		this.applicationMetadata = new ADTMetadataProvider().getApplicationMetadata(this.appSrc);
		if(!gs.nil(this.applicationMetadata) && this.applicationMetadata.status__ !== 'success') {
			ADTLogger.log("Didn't find the application with src: " + this.appSrc, this.type);
			this.errorMessage = "Application not found";
			return false;
		}
		
		if(gs.nil(this.featureSysID)) {
			ADTLogger.log("No feature sys_id is specified", this.type);
			return true;
		} else {
			for(var j = 0; j < this.applicationMetadata.features.length; j++) {
				var feature = this.applicationMetadata.features[j];
				if(this.featureSysID == feature.sys_id) {
					ADTLogger.log("Found the feature requested for", this.type);
					this.applicationMetadata.features = [feature];
					return true;
				}
			}
			this.errorMessage = "Feature not found";
			ADTLogger.log(this.errorMessage, this.type);
			return false;
		}
	},
	
	getApplicationMetadata: function() {
		return this.applicationMetadata;
	},


    type: 'ADTApplicationController'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-19 05:52:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>08dccd64b700001063e1c386ee11a9ee</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ADTApplicationController</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Diagnostics Tool" source="com.snc.app_diagnostics_tool">822052ab47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4382</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08dccd64b700001063e1c386ee11a9ee</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-12 19:14:02</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
